messages.message: can somebody share some knowledge why the DOC_TAG is currently being set to a commit? I wonder if we can set it to the same name as the release branch so we can version our docs and have them in cope with our releases, like today it is hard to figure out what goes to 22.01.0 release with all the cherry-picking. but before making the change I want to check and see if there might be something else I am missing?

:hand: no good reason except we ripped docs out of the monorepo very quickly a few years ago (the quick solution was to use a hash), and never went back to properly make it versionable alongside a release.
docs have no release version right now, which makes updating docs for prior releases impossible. Please fix! :smile:
